# **Title**
Remote Piloted Aircraft System (Drones) Tender Announcement
=====================================

## **Announcement Details**
*Reference Number*: cb-652-58362391
*Amendment Number*: 8
*Procurement Number*: M5000-24-3654/A
*Publication Date*: 16 January 2024
*Tender Closing Date*: 13 February 2024 at 15:00 (Mountain Standard Time)

## **Contract Overview**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) in Edmonton, Alberta, seeks to procure two distinct Streams of Remotely Piloted Aircraft Systems (RPAS) to support various operations in Canadian airspace. The acquired RPAS systems are to be operated within the framework of Canadian Aviation Regulations Part IX.

## **Eligibility Criteria**
This tender is conditionally set aside for Indigenous businesses under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). To be considered, applicants must:

a. Certify compliance with PSIB requirements
b. Confirm Indigenous status as per the Government of Canada's Indigenous Business Directory (IBD)

## **Submission Requirements**
Tenders must include all required documentation and meet the specified requirements outlined in the tender package and Annex A. Eligible bids shall be submitted electronically to: [NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca).

## **Evaluation Criteria**
The procurement methodology is governed by the Integrity Regime, administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. Bidders shall provide evidence of conformance to the requirements stipulated in the procurement documents.

## **Additional Information**
For inquiries, please contact:
Vince Millan, RCMP CMB NWR Procurement and Contracting
5th Floor, 10065 Jasper Avenue NW
Edmonton, AB T5J 3B1
(587) 340-9715
Vince.Millan@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
[tender documents available at Canadabuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities) (Request ID: 29485)

Please refer to the attached tender package for additional information and specification requirements. Only the lowest priced compliant bidder will be selected. All deliverables must be received on or before March 31, 2024. The RCMP reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier.
